modName: Smooth body textures for Better Males and SOS
summary: Modder resource. A collection of normal, diffuse and subsurface maps for male bodies: Better Males & SOS
descriptionHtml:
A collection of normal, diffuse and subsurface maps for male bodies: Better Males & SOS.

[color=#7CFC00][size=4]Concerning permission: this mod is a modder resource. [/size][/color]

You can use the assets contained in this upload, providing that:

1.You will not use the assets from this mod in any mods/files that are being sold for money on Steam Workshop or Other platforms.

2. Your mod is going to be Nexus exclusive. No steam workshop or any other sites.

3.You will give credit and a link back to this page on you description page, readme file AND in your mod's credits section.

4. You will also credit and link the mods of the following authors if you're going to use the body textures:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1630086]Sundracon[/url] for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3421]Nude Male with Import from Roberts new vegas male[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/114172]Chris57[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1106672]FavoredSoul[/url] for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better males[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/62287]AlienSlof[/url] link her site [url=http://www.slofslair.co.uk/index.php]Slof's Hive[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/133829]Robert2[/url] for [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/40532/]RobertMaleBodyReplacerV52 for OBLIVION[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3300018]thegal[/url] for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1947]Nude Males v0_4[/url]

If you want to use the body meshes with underwear, you should additionally credit:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/813611/?]Neovinci[/url] for underwear meshes and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/535888]BaronDavid[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/320142]Imperator3[/url] - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19159]Mens Underwear replacer[/url] for underwear textures. 

If you included all the above mentioned  nicknames and links to in your credits list there is no need for you to contact me, you have permission to use the assets from this mod.

[size=4]Credits:[/size]

Smurf & VectorPlexus [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35463//?]SOS - Schlongs of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1630086]Sundracon[/url] - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3421]Nude Male with Import from Roberts new vegas male[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/114172]Chris57[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1106672]FavoredSoul[/url] - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better males[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/62287]AlienSlof[/url] - [url=http://www.slofslair.co.uk/index.php] Slof's Hive[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2451997]MysticBinary82[/url] - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/265]Bodyhair Nude Male HD[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/133829]Robert2[/url] - [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/40532/]RobertMaleBodyReplacerV52 for OBLIVION[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3300018]thegal[/url] - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1947]Nude Males v0_4[/url]
Special thanks and credits to:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/320142]Imperator3[/url] - for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19159]Mens Underwear replacer[/url] (his credits list include: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/813611]neovinci[/url] - meshes, and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/535888]BaronDavid[/url] - textures).
